mutants.code:
def octal_gray(octal):
    sign = 'MUTATED'
    if octal[0] == '-':
        sign = '-'
        octal = octal[1:]
    binary = bin(int(octal, 8))[2:]
    gray = int(binary, 2) ^ int(binary, 2) >> 1
    return sign + bin(gray)[2:]

def octal_gray(octal):
    sign = ''
    if octal[0] != '-':
        sign = '-'
        octal = octal[1:]
    binary = bin(int(octal, 8))[2:]
    gray = int(binary, 2) ^ int(binary, 2) >> 1
    return sign + bin(gray)[2:]
